fixed_skill.desc: Increase 1 ally's Defense by 23.3%/24.5%/25.6%. For every 500 of the user's Defense, increase the target's Defense by 3.9%/4.1%/4.3% more, up to 15.6%/16.4%/17.2%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Rakukaja

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 11.8% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku III

innate_skill.desc: Decrease Speed by 12. Increase HP by 29%.
innate_skill.name: Ironclad Resolve III

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 31.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase target's healing received by 8.1% for 1 turn. Increase user's healing received by 4.8%.
passive_skill.name: Fortune's Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 31.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase target's healing received by 9.2% for 1 turn. Increase user's healing received by 5.4%.
passive_skill.name: Fortune's Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 31.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase target's healing received by 10.3% for 1 turn. Increase user's healing received by 6%.
passive_skill.name: Fortune's Protection II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 31.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase target's healing received by 11.4% for 1 turn. Increase user's healing received by 6.6%.
passive_skill.name: Fortune's Protection III

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
